titleStmt.title: To the right honourable, the Lord Fairfax, and his councell of vvarre: the humble addresse of Henry Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: In this edition there is a period following "London" in the imprint, and the pagination continues to p.29.
Numerous errors in pagination, signature D mis-signed E, but pagination is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
